title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6653.8 - Approval or disapproval of area plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6653.8 - Approval or disapproval of area plan

State Regulations
(a) The office approves area plans, updates
or amendments which comply with this Chapter. The office will notify each
designated agency that made full and timely submission of such plan (or update)
of the office's approval of or intent to disapprove such plan, or propose
modifications or conditions under subdivision (b) of this section by March 31st
of the year to which the plan applies (unless the office has waived the
deadline for submission of the county home care plan as is provided in section
6653.2
[b]
of this

Part, in which event the office shall notify the designated agency within three
months of submission). (b) If an
area plan, update or amendment does not comply with this Chapter, the office
proposes modifications or conditions to bring the plan, update or amendment
into compliance with this Chapter. If the area agency does not agree to these
modifications or conditions or to other changes which bring the plan, update or
amendment into compliance with this Chapter, the office notifies the area
agency of its intent to disapprove the plan, update or amendment. (c) An area agency which is notified by the
office of its intent to disapprove an area plan, update or amendment may
request a hearing under this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6653.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
